snippet: What if you want to skip Top N rows while doing a select statement in sql server?Try thisDECLARE @count INT = 5SELECT *FROM &lt;&lt;Table&gt;&gt;WHERE &lt;condition&gt;ORDER BY &lt;&lt;column&gt;&gt;OFFSET @count ROWSHope this helped.
